website_summaries.verdict: Logitech's $200 G19 Gaming Keyboard boasts a built-in color LCD with exciting capabilities, as well as lots of little improvements over previous models. But with few apps--thus far--that take advantage of the screen in a meaningful way, the G19's potential remains largely untapped. Until the community software effort gets rolling, we can't recommend spending this much on a keyboard that, while flashy, has yet to realize its full potential.
pros: Large color LCD supports digital photos and video playback
included software development kit opens LCD up to homebrew and community-made apps
16 million color options for backlit keys
improved macro recording capabilities with support for five simultaneous key presses
cons: High price could limit adoption and thus hurt community software momentum

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but cool lights
customer_reviews.text: Really good keyboard! I never used the macro buttons all that much. You can set the backlighting to any color you want, which is cool. The screen displays some useful information, although I was left desiring the keyboard to do more in regards to that aspect. Overall, I think I spent way too much on this one. Not really worth the money IMO
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Trevor Duke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Item stated used like new. Arrive new In the box never opened. So excited I've had the G15 since it came out love it . Used for almost 20 years. Hoping this one holds up just as well. The full color display shows more information and easier contrast settings for my glaucoma.
customer_reviews.author: Marymargaret

customer_reviews.title: So there seems to be a "known" issue with the ...
customer_reviews.text: So there seems to be a "known" issue with the connection between the LCD screen and the power cable coming from the keyboard that causes the LCD screen to malfunction, stop registering upon PC start up and then just continue to blink on/off. For the price of this keyboard do you really need a LCD screen? Not really, I would suggest putting your hard earned money towards a simpler designed keyboard made with more durable parts. There are some DIY logs of opening up the keyboard and re-soldering the connections....why does that have to fall on the customer and not the producer?
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Gropp

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard, love the usb ports
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these keyboards, one each for my desktop and my laptop. The design is great, comfortable and key keys and keyboard are very sturdy. The LCD display is functional and adequate, but mostly is a distraction when gaming, with the exception of monitoring the CPU and RAM usage. The 2 powered usb ports are amazing and convenient, especially to plug in a high res gaming mouse near the keyboard. The functionality of the light up keys is a nice touch, as well as the macro keys and the media keys. Overall, I have had minimal problems with the keyboard, and would highly recommend it for people interested in a high quality interactive gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: A.Clement

customer_reviews.title: Faulty wiring
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Logitech G19 yesterday. Great looking keyboard. Solid feel on the keys. Like the many features. Only down side is it has an issue with the wiring between the keyboard and the LCD screen. It is not properly insulated and causes the screen the flicker and sometimes reset itself. There is a video on Youtube on how to fix the problem. At this point I have not attempted to fix it myself because doing so will void the warranty. Just thought I would let everyone who is planning on buying this keyboard that this is a very common problem reported on the Logitech customer support page for the G19.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but LCD is failing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine around Thanksgiving 2013, and it's holding up so far. Keys feel great even after heavy usage in gaming. There was one nuisance out of box with the menu button by the LCD registering multiple presses after only one, which just requires a heavy push when navigating the menus. The only real downside is that the LCD screen has lost the ability to show solid black. The whole screen has a faded blue tone where there was black originally. I noticed it about a month after installing. Everything is still legible on the screen though, so it really isn't interfering with gameplay info. I'm debating whether it's worth the effort to return/replace.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works well - WITH WINDOWS
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from G15 - I wish it was brighter with some colors, but otherwise it works well. Despite being an avid gamer and programmer, this keyboard has been reliable. The profiler can be a little annoying to set up, but once you work out the macros it is smooth sailing. UPDATE - I threw this G19 on my programming Macbook Pro because I like the key feedback. The Display (like the G15) will work for a few minutes before the items freeze, and I have to powercycle the keyboards power connection. I love these keyboards, but I wouldn't hook one of these up to a mac with the expectation of using the display on them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: An excellent multifunctional keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is pretty useful for gaming purposes. It's full color LCD display provides plenty of feedback to player, though it varies by game. The keyboard also features a number of handy utilities. The performance monitor shows you the load on all of your CPU cores as well as the amount of RAM that you are currently using. It also features a news headline app which keeps me apprised of the latest breaking headlines in world news. Combine those things with the macro keys and the media and volume controls and you have a pretty solid keyboard that provides a lot of functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: parts start to break over time
customer_reviews.text: in the past year I've owned this product the screen has to started to flick on and off caused by poor wiring insulation and the wrist guard snapped off (very poor plastic attachment). It's built very poorly and there's a lot of parts that can break. My friends have had the exact same problems. pros: the keys feel good colored key light options cons: poor quality construction the screen is all but useless and difficult to navigate G keys are unreachable and useless macros for any game I play
customer_reviews.author: KIING

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, lots of extras.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie... I bought this keyboard because it can change colors and has a cool looking screen. That's it. That being said, it is a great keyboard. The cable routing channels are a pain in the butt but that's my only complaint. Having 2 powered sub ports on the unit is handy but not really necessary. I haven't had to use the macro keys yet so I can't comment on their performance. The menu navigation buttons for the lcd screen are a bit sluggish or unresponsive but they work if you don't push them too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sir William

customer_reviews.title: Logitect G19 Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: At 50 % off was a great buy. My first review to Logitech was less than satisfactory as it was inopperable out of the box. Not very pleased with Customer Support in that I had to spend 45 minutes online with them validating the fact that it was inoperable when the unit did not have half the buttons on the keyboard functional. After reinstalling software 2x the rep had to get permission for the sending of replacement unit. They did replace within 2 days and the new unit functioned perfectly. Would recommend in the future that Customer Service listen to the Customer when they discribe the problem and not waste their time in validating issue
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: LCD flickers and hangs,keyboard itself is built solid for MMOs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make this review as simple as I could PROS: Lots of customization possibilities Solid built Great for MMOs CONS: Not useful for FPS games as WASD keys are too close to the 10 custom keys on the left and you keep on hitting them in crunch situations. I play a lot of CS GO and other FPS and got frustrated in the first few days of using it. Had to return it due to the lack luster LCD eventually LCD however is the worst part on the KB as the software in it needs a lot of improvement. LCD kept on flickering, occasionally hanged. I hope this was helpful for you guys
customer_reviews.author: DRONOZYTE

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This computer gaming keyboard was purchased as a gift for my son-in-law who had seen it on a store's display and was impressed by it's variety of interesting and "colorful" features especially including the small video screen which can be programmed to display different things just as the keys on the board itself can be programmed to display different colors. He finds it fascinating and gets great pleasure when gaming while using it. QWERTY never had it so good!
customer_reviews.author: JorgeTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted this for a long while and am not disappointed. The only thing I hate is Logitech's gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted this for a long while and am not disappointed. The only thing I hate is Logitech's gaming software which will randomly stop working at times. But it has been a problem since long before I added this keyboard to my setup. I also run the G13 and the G602. This keyboard sometimes feels a little "Stiff", but the extra USB ports and colour screen make all the difference int he world. I also love having the Media Controls easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: G.Hans

customer_reviews.title: Could be so much more.
customer_reviews.text: The LCD and available apps got me interested in this KB. Some would say I was downgrading from my mechanical Razer Ultimate Black Widow but I did switch because that Razer was so damned loud. The G19 has very easy programmable macros, I like the key-press feel (but I'm partial to a spongy board). The LCD on-board menu is horrid and the secondary support for apps/api makes it almost a worthless feature. The volume roller on the right hand side above the num-pad is a pretty nice placement though. It having 2 USB ports is nice, but for the lighting. LCD, and software it needs a secondary power source.
customer_reviews.author: Gio C

customer_reviews.title: I still love this keyboard and have had it for years now!
customer_reviews.text: This review is written after using this product for a few years. I love this keyboard and am typing on it now. It has served me well and provided many hours of enjoyment while gaming as well as emailing and general activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten's Boy's Miss

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard, it's so nice, well built, super high quality, and so useful. You can customize the screen with many applications, even 3rd party ones and basically turn it into a little mini desktop. The macro keys are conveniently located and work great. I docked it 1 star because of 1 problem however, the power connection to this keyboard is flawed and after a while it will make the keyboard act funny; screen wont turn on, lights wont come on, etc... There is a way to fix this yourself so google it!
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It is a great keyboard and it does all of the tasks it is required. I love the LCD display and built in game integration to display information for most of the games that I play. Macros and hot keys work as expected with a very vast amount of customization. USB hub works great to power other devices and I have not had any issues with it either. Cons: Keys don't response to soft touch all of the time when you are used to a thin key keyboard. I wish the keys were thin like the Logitech Solar keyboard. (my previous keyboard) Personal note, it is a desktop hog.
customer_reviews.author: DreadfullyDespized

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's works great and I guess the screen is fine but I find myself wondering semi-frequently if I really needed the color screen. I don't find myself regretting the purchase but I so rarely find myself looking at the screen or using the gaming keys even in games that I really wonder why I bought this model. Then I remember that it's got 2 extra USB ports on the keyboard for my mouse and controller and all is forgiven. Truth me told I like the keyboard a lot but I don't know if I'd recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product... when it works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard after being a longtime fan of Logitech products. I had the G15 (both versions), and several mice and speakers. This is the only product with which I have had enough trouble that it is almost unusable. Please check your system configuration before purchasing this keyboard. I have an ASUS P6T motherboard with a Core i7 920 Intel chip running Windows 7 Premium. The keyboard constantly looses connection with this and several other motherboard/chipset configurations. It is beyond frustrating, it is now to the point that I have started using my old G15 (2nd generation), and put the G19 in the closet until Logitech corrects the issue. Check the Logitech support forums before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Disco Lights!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome keyboard! I love it and I've had it for some time now! No problems what so ever! I wish there were more applets but other than that the performance is excellent! Macros are easy to setup and use. The display is helpful in some games! The best part is finding a disco light applet and playing some music and watching it change colors and go with the music!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After comparing the G15, G510 and G110 I had to try out the G19. Its got an amazingly clear LCD, a load of macro keys, a smooth scroll wheel for volume control and can change backlighting to any color on the color circle. The software was a little clunky getting started, but once you start using it, its fairly straight forward. It also requires its own power plug, but given the combo of the lights and LCD you'd imagine the USB wouldnt be enough. You get 3 buttons on the board for setting colors, but it would have been nice to be able to do this via the onboard LCD. All in all, its an amazing keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard
customer_reviews.text: If you can spare a buck and want the best gaming keyboard this is it. Illuminated keys help you when you game at night in the dark room. The color lcd displays stats on characters for example if you play WoW it will display battleground stats, or if you play Dragon Age Origins it will display your party's stats. It comes with 2 USB slots on the top, excellent. You can also have multiple keys pressed, no issue. The lcd display super cool. No issues at all with hardware or software using windows 7. I even dropped it and no problems. Best keyboard yet. Logitech has not failed me on any products I have purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: The best top #1 keyboard. And you can't get it anymore.  =(
customer_reviews.text: The best that Logitech had ever made. To bad they gave up on this line. The G-19 was my only choice. Now I have to go to other brands because the cell phone thing isn't what I'm looking for. I want an LCD screen. Or nothing. End of line.
customer_reviews.author: Issac E. Howard Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this keyboard a while back and i love it, goes well along with my g13, g700 & g930 headset. Found a custom script online that aloud me to sync and cycle the colors on the keyboard between the g19 and g13 (looks very cool) unfortunately no one has really developed any applets for the screen on this thing, so the screen is pretty much useless, however i am able to put msi afterburner applet and a core temp applet so i can monitor my system while i game. there's also a fraps applet that's pretty cool was well if you like to monitor your FPS i love my Logitech products and i recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is great when it actually works
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great when it actually works. The problem is that Logitech's (bad) gaming software doesn't actually recognize the the stupid thing a lot of the time. Google"G19 flashing not recognized" to see how common, frustrating, and reoccurring this issue is. My previous Logitech keyboard had some issues as well, but not nearly a bad as this piece of junk. Summary: Don't buy Logitech keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Responsive
customer_reviews.text: This is a good keyboard for gaming or for anyone that needs programmable keys. The screen is a plus. I had to get used to the G keys on the left hand side of the keyboard since I was used to the normal form keyboards. It has two USB 2.0 ports on the top right of it which are powered even when your computer is off. Keys felt cheap at first but its expected from them being hollowed out for the backlights that can be set to any color.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this keyboard for a little over 6 months, and I have very little to complain about. The back lit keys are nice and bright, the macro keys are very useful, and the LCD display is great for temperature monitoring. Logitech's software for this unit is also great, allowing for a great deal of color customization for the back lit keys. The key caps feel great, though I wish the switches were mechanical. All in all this is a great gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a gaming keyboard I paid $100 for, and get sent a dirty, busted keyboard that I had to take 5 minutes to clean myself that doesn't even work properly. One of the keys are busted off and the screen doesn't even work! I was completely ripped off. NOT worth $100.00
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best keyboard I have ever used. The keys don't take much pressure to actuate, and they don't feel squishy. The keyboard isn't one of those loud ones that will keep someone sleeping awake. The ability to personalize the it is amazing!! so many colors to choose from for the board and you can make 5 profiles and switch between them easily. each profile can have its own color scheme and macro settings Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: d. man

customer_reviews.title: Clunky, Funky and Doh
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is expensive, clunky, chunky keys that need to be pushed further down than necessary and a screen that can be difficult to get to work properly. It also came with a funky plug with adapter. Yet It looks darn good, my son loves it and, after a while of loading drivers, got the little screen to work. Here is a pic...
customer_reviews.author: gadgetjunkiTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Search online for "Logitech g19 randomly restarts" read about the misery that has never been fixed then go buy another brand keyboard. Watch the video on youtube about the horrible insulation job and read the nonsense from Logitech blaming motherboards and bios settings and have a good chuckle. You don't want this keyboard and the all-too-common nightmares it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Probably overkill
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard with the exception that the F keys don't line up with numerals (coming from the mx5500 I was a bit disappointed with that. Backspace on mine is loud to touch, otherwise you can fly though typing with very low sounds. Logitech gaming software is junk and requires a restart about daily on a system running 8 Enterprise. All and all, nice keyboard, but I probably would've been fine with something about half the price.
customer_reviews.author: TechnicallyCharmed

customer_reviews.title: Hell yeah
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for endless customization, both in and outside you're gaming world, this is the keyboard you buy. Looks fantastic, with lcd screen and backlight features designed to fit any sort of gaming setup. Control everything from your fingertips, with a endless supply of customizable keys for shortcuts/macros etc. Yes, it is on the pricy side but this is not a keyboard you should be looking to buy unless you're sure you can make full use of its features either. Overall, its the best gaming keyboard to date on the market, and with good reason.
customer_reviews.author: Oseriduun

customer_reviews.title: No Problems works good...
customer_reviews.text: No problems great software Got the wrong adapter it came with an austrailian 1 but i looked at it the voltage is compatable with us i just took a pair of pliers and bent the plugins to fit us wall outlet checked the voltage with multimeter and BOOM! it works...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard great brand I been using logictech for 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard great brand I been using logictech for 6 years now and they have never let me down if u are into mmo gaming u got to get the g19 it's it's great to use it feels good it's easy to use and the LCD screen is awesome I have the g15 and when I saw that they are coming with the g19 I wanted to get it so overall I give it a 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mc_Dc_4891

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is hands down the best keyboard I've ever had. I have an Alienware and I love matching up the colors from the keyboard to the computer. Also, you can change the color based on which game you play...and a lot of popular games have stats that popup on the screen (which is awesome so I don't have to tab to see stats!)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Low quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard to replace my old G15 and am now back to using the G15. The feel and quality of the keyboard is extremely poor compared to logitech's previous products. Especially annoying are the laggy button presses. This was my second attempt at replacing my G15 and I can only conclude that Logitech has no plans on producing a keyboard equal to the g15 again.
customer_reviews.author: RonW

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard to replace my old G15 since the keys were sticking and fading. So far id have to say this is a great keyboard. Its not too big and not too small, it has a lot of macro keys and its easy to set up with the software. You can also change the colors of the keys to anything you want. I gave it 4 stars because the keyboard is expensive, and the USB cable is kind of short, it reaches my PC but I have to stretch it at bit.
customer_reviews.author: B. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard with outstanding tutorials.
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard for what I needed. I have been an online gamer, member of the usmercs.com squad for nearly 10 year and a player of CoD Ghosts at present. The customized micro keys are a great addition to any keyboard and the display keeps you informed of what you chose to monitor. I was considering displaying ts users but do that on a second monitor so I only use it for the time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is great keys are quiet they are not mechanical so this ...
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great keys are quiet they are not mechanical so this is the only thing that may worry me over time but the display is great the G keys help alot and the colors for profiles are wonderful it works great under windows 7 ultimate 64 bit I have been using this with the new logitech 402 mouse it has helped my gaming alot..
customer_reviews.author: Mike Metzgar

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Truly comfortable fit on the fingers. Easy to see keycaps if you're a peeker like I am. Lasts a long time without needing to be recharged
customer_reviews.author: MapDaddy

customer_reviews.title: They will have to pry it from my cold dead fingers!
customer_reviews.text: Best keyboard I have ever owned in over 30 years of computing. The LCD I use constantly in Photoshop zoomed in at mouse point. Zoom level is adjustable through the menu buttons. Only draw back is there wasn't more support for apps from Logitech, they should have created a lot more than they did but then they always abandon their products after they release them.
customer_reviews.author: Run

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on the next G Series.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on a half off sale from Amazon. Got it for $99, no tax, and used my Amazon Prime for free shipping. Ordered before noon so I got it the next day! Love this keyboard, it has the full color spectrum, easy to program macro, and if you convert a video file correctly, you can get it to play on the small LED screen. :)
customer_reviews.author: Vvgamepro

customer_reviews.title: ... for my birthday totally worth it wish there was better lcd screen support though the macro hotkey on the ...
customer_reviews.text: i still hear the story from my wife for spending 200$ on a keyboard for my birthday totally worth it wish there was better lcd screen support though the macro hotkey on the keyboard seems damaged in some way. not a big deal i just make macros through the program in windows
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing keyboard. I love that you can completely customize the backlighting on the keys. You can even download apps for the LCD screen and use multiple profiles for gaming etc. It also has USB ports. Couldn't be more happy with this product! Love it so much that I even bought one for a friend that had an older model logitech keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLokiTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard works great for me and I love the small LCD for knowing who is talking on Vent or Teamspeak. It has plenty of G keys for MMO's. The typing is smooth and the back-lit is great. This keyboard is BIG though so make sure you have enough desk space.
customer_reviews.author: JVCJr

customer_reviews.title: Not so awesome
customer_reviews.text: At first look this seems a great keyboard. It is solidly built. The keys are excellently back-lit and the key-presses feel great. After I had this keyboard for a couple weeks it began disconnecting from mu computer every few days. this may seem very occasional but when you spend $200 on a keyboard you expect it to work all the time. unfortunately I did not meet Amazons return policy by about a week so am stuck with it. After a couple of months trial and error I have learned that the crashes are caused by interference from my cell phone a motorola W376G. I have since moved where I keep my phone charging and the problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brixius

customer_reviews.title: Master keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great for many reasons such as sturdy, the little lcd screen,however the most significant one would be the fact that it has a little switch that tells the keyboard it's in gaming mode making the windows,alt, del keys non-responsive. So fire away without worrying about interrupting your game by accidentally pressing your windows key. Overall a great buy, will last you a long time and it looks quite good as well on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Crimsonarmor

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The onkeyboard screen is cool, but that's not why I purchased this keyboard. The G Macro functions are so useful for games like WoW or other macro based games. Also the keys feel nice and are not quiet, but reasonable. There is also brackets under your keyboard to route your audio wires. Perfect gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: amazing keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Another item I purchased for my husband. He is very big into gaming. He absolutely loves this keyboard and all his friends also love it. It is very customizable and that is something he was looking for. He loves that he can change the keys colors and also that he can change what is shown on the screen. He likes that he can keep up with the computer stats while he is playing because when you are in a game you can't stop to check out your computer stats. It is really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi86

customer_reviews.title: Check for compatibility with your games first, otherwise the LCD is little more than a novelty.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is marvelous. I especially like the roller-style volume controller. The LCD could certainly use support from Logitech. I don't have a single game that makes use of it. It's chief use for me is viewing video clips. Not really what I wanted the keyboard for.
customer_reviews.author: Ruble A. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Lights, camera and action? No
customer_reviews.text: Lights, LCD and action! Logitech G19 has not only stood the test of time against other gaming keyboards, but in my opinion it is the best gaming keyboard for me. If you're looking for excellent quality, great function and aesthetics, it might cost a little more than your average keyboard, but know you're getting one of the best gaming keyboards on the planet!
customer_reviews.author: CyberCache

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I managed to make my SteelSeries keyboard (the original) last a long time. Despite pounding on it in the midst of intense gaming action. This Logitech G19 is sweet! The programmable keys do more than I need. If it lasts half as long as my SteelSeries did it won't owe me a dime. I think I'll put my SWTOR Jedi Guardian's (tank!) rotation in the programming.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy JR

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the keyboard for WoW (kind of it's main purpose) and it does what I need. I only have a few gripes. The music controls will skip 2 songs every time if you're using iTunes and the pause won't work, seems like it was designed for Windows Media Player? Also, the youtube app for the screen is garbage, you can't even search. If they ever had an update allowing for searching of youtube it'd be fine, but all you can do is look at most popular and other lists.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Needs 3rd party Support
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to clean, not a deal breaker though. Arm rest which is provided and attaches separately to the main keyboard has a small stub that clips into the main keyboard, broke about 8 months in. Lack of third party developer support is a huge let down. Keys feel nice though, better in many aspects than mechanical.
customer_reviews.author: John Glen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but really nice
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this keyboard, I thought it would have been a mechanical keyboard. So, I was sad to find out that it wasn't. But, it has a lot of awesome features. I don't use the LCD much because two games I play don't use it (StarCraft 2 and DotA 2), but it works for many more games. I don't use the buttons on the side or the macro recording features, but they're nice to have. I love the media keys, and this keyboard is still a very good one. And I absolutely LOVE the fact that it has a powered USB hub built into the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Keyboard anfd functional too
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. Looks cool. Do I need the display on KB, no, but looks cool. Actually having the CPU/RAM display on it is handy. I purchased this because I needed back lit keys, and this works great for that. Also customizable buttons are good. I am not a gamer, but I use this for business and it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CPoint

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Keyboard Even If Yor Not A Gamer
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard it's bright and clear to read in the dark. The keys are solid and multiple profiles are great. I use one profile to bind hotkeys for multiple monitors, and shortcuts in programs. The ability to change the colors in the backlight is great. I use the you tube video player in the LCD which is really a good screen. It is As good as my Samsung phone LCD the display is crisp and bright. I like the ability to have pre determined profiles for popular games. Expensive but worth it if you like to type in low light or your a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: bharris291

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, Item as described, Would buy from again, Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Charles F McFadden Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I did have to return the first one that was sent because it was defective, but the return was handled very quickly and easily and the replacement has no problems. The only thing that could be an inconvenience is that the keyboard (and anything plugged into it's usb ports) doesn't function until the computer has finished booting into windows, so if you need input during setup or troubleshooting you'll probably need another keyboard to use temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: The Lexus of keyboards. Understanding that everything breaks eventually ...
customer_reviews.text: The Lexus of keyboards. Understanding that everything breaks eventually, I have bought three of these. Each lasted about 2 years. I use them HARD. Still nothing tops it and I keep coming back.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. The software is kind of dissapointing as it pretty much only supports the new games. I was dissapointed with World of Warcraft profile. It is in black and white on a color display??? Who's idea was that? I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the price. I think the price of this keyboard is way too high.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: LCD for your gadgets on your keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: this keyboard is great, the keys actually feel weighted which gives it a different feel, the LCD is great, i ended up installing an app named lcdhost and now run all my temp gadgets on the actual lcd screen, it also has programmable keys that you can macro into for convenience. A+ gaming keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Peedro

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says... Everything works great. My girlfriend enjoys the colored keys so she can make it pink and i can change it back with just one button. The performance monitor is neat, and actually caused me to get more ram. I didn't realize that I was maxing out my 4 gig's of ram in battlefield so i went and bought 16 gigs. Pros: Color keys, LCD Display comes in handy. Fun and bit of eyecandy with the keyboard. Cons: Can't use the LCD with any of the games I play. (No big deal i suppose) But i recommend you look into what games the LCD can be used with before purchase. No regrets, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: TwiztidGuy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I received my keyboard really fast; slipped the CD into my PC, plugged in the keyboard and I was off and running. Really cool how you can change the key colors! Its LED clock/stop watch/countdown/performance monitor on the upper center is a great gadget too! I'm very satisfied with the service and the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: CaptJoe

customer_reviews.title: Badass
customer_reviews.text: Nice key response, tactile feel from the keys. Not too loud. Very nice quality and the fact you can pick not just a few but virtually any color on the spectrum for the back lighting is very cool. I hope it lasts as long as my old Razor (which was still going strong at 6 years), because I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brighton

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my gamer in the house! It's fantastic! The four color changeable keyboard and the small built in screen works great! The design and layout works well with gamers. The keyboard has good enough pressure and also easily programmable. His best friend is also buying one. Thanks Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had my G19 for about a month. Overall, I like the keyboard even if the LCD really isn't that valuable. My biggest disappointment is that the backspace key doesn't work. I try it on multiple computers, different operating systems, and it doesn't work. Even more disappointing is customer service hasn't been responsive. When you pay$120+ for a keyboard, I expect all the keys to work or at least for you to make it work. I will keep my review updated in case I'm available to identify a fix.
customer_reviews.author: movie_frenzy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome... hands down best keyboard I've ever owned. The apps created for this thing are so nice and easy to use. If you know C, you can even code your own apps to do custom activities. The possibilities are limitless. I downloaded an app to change the LED back light colors to the beat and loudness of music that I play... its like a rave on my desk. SO COOL!! Most stores near by had this keyboard for $200... $139 is a hell of a deal for this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Logitech G-19 keyboard. I loved the first one so much that when I broke my first one, I didn't hesitate to invest in a replacement. A small word of warning, don't get the cables caught in your recliner - the cables WILL eventually wear out if pinched too many times. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in September, but wanted to use it for a little before I posted my review. To be honest, I love this keyboard especially the color LCD. I'm sure I don't utilize it to it's full potential, but for what I do use it for it's great. If you are looking for a good reliable keyboard, look no further. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Zupancic

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard but...
customer_reviews.text: The spacebar squeaks. Like every. single. depression. I've pulled it off, verified nothing is in there and cleaned everything. Still squeaks. It's been my primary keyboard for about 6 months and it still squeaks. Yes I got used to it, but this should not happen on a $200 keyboard. Contemplating RMA
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: but with the issues around the drivers and display screen not working in windows 7/8 it really isn't any better than any other U
customer_reviews.text: This could be a 5 star, but with the issues around the drivers and display screen not working in windows 7/8 it really isn't any better than any other USB keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Rubber dome keys could be trouble.
customer_reviews.text: Great keybord except for the fact is has rubber dome keys instead of mechanical ones. Some reviews on the web talk about poor key response or tactile feel. I had one key on my G19 that had almost no tactile feedback. I found the problem to be a mis-alignment of the rubber dome membrane when the keyboard was assembled. A portion of the rubber dome for the key in question was slightly pinched under the plastic webbing of the keyboard top (revealed by popping off the key cap). Used a small screw driver to carefully free the ruber material from under the plastic webbing and the key was fine.
customer_reviews.author: SL Popp

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard. Screen functionality is a bit limited and does not remain when you reset your computer. Great programmable buttons and the layout is also quite good. I love all the backlight options, but I do not find useful that they have to be linked to a profile...
customer_reviews.author: Luis G. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Main selling point rather lacking
customer_reviews.text: This keyboards main selling point is of course the screen. However do yourself a favor and google search for g19 apps before pulling the trigger on this keyboard. theres pretty much nothing available other than the stock apps. You could of course make your own with the provided sdk or save yourself some money and get a board without a screen.
customer_reviews.author: joe dirt

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is a good gaming keyboard and feels rather
customer_reviews.text: Rather bulky and the chord is becoming frayed at where it connects to the keyboard. Overall it is a good gaming keyboard and feels rather solid
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B5

customer_reviews.title: Wasted potential
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard and neat little screen makes my system look great. However there is not enough support in terms of games for the color LCD. For the price you pay, you don't get enough value. Please integrate more game for this and it will be more bang for the buck and therefore merit 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: ALLUSA

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard just looks cool but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard just looks cool but that's about it. I had to replace it very quickly when I had it. It's not sturdy. The display screen only worked for a very limited amount of games. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic device - Do wish the keys were more sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic device. I love the feel of a good keyboard, and the G series consistently fits that bill. What I wish it had : slightly shorter throw keys. I find myself pushing a key occasionally that doesn't register because it doesn't go down quite far enough to pick it up. Does it remove a star? Nah, not really, but I really wish it was a little more sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Blalock

customer_reviews.title: RAW
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING this is the best keyboard that you can possibly buy, I know that some people say that the keys are kinda funny feeling and they are at first but after about a day it is nothing other than that the customization is soooooo sooooooo good
customer_reviews.author: babyj

customer_reviews.title: Gaming Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the Wife to "one up" my G15 keyboard. I built myself a gaming rig, and when building hers, everything had to be "one up" from mine. The keyboard was no exception. It does exactly what it needs to and is very customizable. She has been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Truely a dominant Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this keyboard powerful but it looks good doing it too. The customizable LED backlighting is awesome and so are the programmable macro keys. It takes a while to get used to, but they really make work and play more productive. The LCD is cool but I'm not quite sure what to do with it most of the time. My understanding is that there are programs to customize it but I haven't really looked into it yet. The only thing that initially held me back from this keyboard was the price, but I got it for a really good deal here so I figured why settle for anything less than the best
customer_reviews.author: ECG

customer_reviews.title: More than enough keys for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband a long while ago and just now getting around the reviewing it. It's a good keyboard and does what it's supposed to. My husband loves it for his games and has more than enough keys to use for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard, the screen is kind of gimmicky but it does have its uses. Since the keyboard is as old as it is, it makes finding apps for it actually more difficult then if you had bought it when it was fairly new. The backlight being pretty much any color is a nice touch, the scroll wheel is really what sold me on the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lyman Wood

customer_reviews.title: Quite a bit of keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this keyboard, however, it lacks the clackity clack of my mechanical keyboard that I find very satisfying. I rarely use the small screen, and I can't seem to play anything other than windows videos on it. Solid buy, I really like the USB port placement.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: OK for normal use but not ideal for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: OK for normal use but not ideal for gaming. Fine for other uses. cons: Uses cheap bubble keys.For the price it should have better keys.
customer_reviews.author: Freeradical

customer_reviews.title: Love it - nuff said!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best gaming keyboard I know of, and I've used a few. The new UI makes what used to be just a good choice into what for me has become a mainstay. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for versatility. options, and has the patience to learn thier tech in order to take full advantage of everything it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing i wish it had.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming keyboard, therefore I can only say so much. The keys feel good, color control is great.Everything works. The on screen display is where it truly shines though. It works very well and looks pretty dang good. However there is not much in the way of apps for it. But the open source means lots of websites with many choices of user created content. PS. the one thing I would change or add is headphone and mic jacks on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: chris cooley

customer_reviews.title: G19 super fun
customer_reviews.text: I am a 65 year old male that has been enjoying games for a long time. A young friend of my grandson told me how I could do better playing game if I had a better key board. This G19 key board was one of my better investments in playing games like Rift. I would tell everyone that is a real gamer to get this G19.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, rubbery, small keys, problematic power cable
customer_reviews.text: When you push the media/menu buttons at the top, the whole keyboard bends in, very flimsy. The keys are extremely rubbery, and they grip your fingers too much. Unlike the G15, it has an extra power cable which is bundled with the USB cable, with very short runs, it makes plugging into both power AND computer potentially difficult. The keyboard has almost exactly the same length and width dimensions as my saitek cyborg, and with all the extra media/menu/macro buttons, the actual keyboard becomes smaller and harder to use. Only one height adjustment unlike other medium-high end gaming keyboards. Used keyboard for approximately 45 minutes. Packed it back up and it's shipping back to Amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I had a G15, i got water on it, so i got a g19
customer_reviews.text: nice macro keyboard. Some of the keys make a bit of noise as you type, but its not bad. they also need a bit of extra pressure to press down. The LCD does not fold down or back, so it is in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbvi

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: After some consulting of the manual the LCD display options were nice, not too hard to get up and running and the keyboard itself works great. After a month of use no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: davoz28caboose

customer_reviews.title: Everything I could ever need.
customer_reviews.text: In a few short words, I don't think I'll ever need a new keyboard again; it does/has everything I need and then some. There are so many features available to utilize and even personalize to your own style....even the color of the key lights. But as if you need to read my review, the box tells you all this and more. I'm still learning more about what I can do with my keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: 'S' Key Stopped working after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: VERY cool... until the 'S' key stopped working after a couple months. Don't waste your money. Logitech makes other decent products and you should probably choose one of those. Or try this one -
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: piece of crap that locked up all keys and not let me type or do nothing while in the middle of something important causing me to lose out on it.
customer_reviews.author: T-master

customer_reviews.title: Critical Error
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard primarily for it's ability to play You Tube videos on the screen. I thought, for the price, that i was making a miracle purchase for my MMORPG career. Guess again. After spending 2+ hours figuring out how to work the complex commands to watch a specific video (AKA boss guides), I was stunned to discover 90% of the videos on the applet do not work. Combine this with the small number of macro keys and the lack of compatibility with my favorite MMO Rift, and I simply cannot recommend this product to anyone. Go with the cheaper Logitech keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard ever
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard great for gaming or office use. I use it for both and I'm happy with it, that is if your willing to pay this price for a keyboard don't spend too much time researching those razor or what ever. It works great with mac an iTunes and I am able to control my iTunes through the mini display. It looks great on the desk and feels solid, the keys are spongy and doesn't look like their coming off it your type too hard either.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sardinha

customer_reviews.title: excellent keyboard however I was disappointed that the power adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent keyboard however I was disappointed that the power adapter did not fit the us standard outlet and so I was forced to buy an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: KayKay

product_meta.title: Logitech G19 Programmable Gaming Keyboard with Color Display
product_meta.description:
Give yourself the advantage you need to win. Giving you an arsenal of advanced gaming technology, the Logitech G19 gaming keyboard is the first Logitech keyboard to feature a color GamePanel LCD. The tilt able, 320-by-240-pixel display provides valuable in-game information for over sixty games, including World of Warcraft (requires installation of included Logitech GamePanel software)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer Give yourself the advantage you need to win. Giving you an arsenal of advanced gaming technology, the Logitech G19 gaming keyboard is the first Logitech keyboard to feature a color GamePanel LCD. The tiltable, 320-by-240-pixel display provides valuable in-game information for over sixty games, including World of Warcraft (requires installation of included Logitech GamePanel software).



In addition to in-game information, the screen can show VoIP communication data, clock, CPU load, or other non-gaming specific items such as pictures or videos. And you can easily switch among types of information – without ever leaving your game.

If you take your gameplay seriously, you want the Logitech G19 on your side. Play with the best.




Key Features


Color GamePanel LCD
A tiltable, color GamePanel LCD displays game stats, system information, VOIP communication data, video playback, image slideshows, and many other items, without leaving the game.



User-Selectable Character Backlighting Color
Lets you personalize the keyboard to complement the rest of your computer and gaming equipment.



12 Fully Programmable G-keys with Three Macros Per Key
Provide space to program 36 time-saving commands per game (single keypresses or complex macros). The MR key allows you to record new macros on-the-fly.



Two High-Speed, Powered USB 2.0 Ports
You can connect and power devices – such as your G9x Laser Mouse or G35 Headset – with the two high-speed USB 2.0 ports. You also have the ability to transfer data to and from peripherals – like MP3 players and flash drives – while providing power to charge battery-powered devices.



Game Mode Switch
A game/desktop mode switch lets you disable the Windows /Context Menu keys so you don’t get accidentally kicked out of your game.



Multi-Key Input
Performing multiple actions simultaneously is also made easier with the keyboard’s multi-key input-functionality, which allows you to engage up to five keys at the same time.



Suggested games for the Logitech G19 Gaming Keyboard:

 * World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King 
 * Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning 
 * Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures 
 * The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria 
 * Left 4 Dead 
 * Call of Duty: World at War 
 * Crysis Warhead 
 * Fallout 3 
 * Brothers in Arms: Hell's Highway 




Check out the G-SERIES from Logitech:

Logitech G13 Advanced Gameboard

The G13 advanced gameboard gives you game-changing comfort and control. Naturally contoured design follows the natural shape of your hand and fingers for increased comfort during long sessions.

Logitech G25 Racing Wheel

With simulator-grade force feedback, 900° of wheel rotation, and a true six-speed stick, this high-performance racing wheel lets you feel every inch of the road for maximum control.

Logitech G35 Surround Sound Headset

Game-changing immersion with 7.1 surround sound powered by Dolby technology. Featuring swappable headband pads, customizable G keys, and on-ear audio controls.

Logitech G51 Surround Sound Speaker System

Bring your games to life with 360° surround sound – for amazing audio clarity that lets you hear your enemies sneaking up behind you.




What's in the Box 
Package Contents  * Logitech G19 Gaming Keyboard 
 * AC power adapter 
 * Software CD-ROM 
 * User documentation 
 * 1-year limited hardware warranty 

System Requirements  * Windows XP and Windows Vista 
 * Mac OS X 10.4 or later 
 * Available high-speed USB 2.0 port 
 * 20 MB of available hard disk space 
 * CD-ROM drive 

GamePanel LCD requires software that supports Logitech GamePanel technology. See front of box for a partial list, or visit www.logitech.com/gamepanel.
feature_bullets: A color GamePanel LCD displays game stats, system information, VOIP communication data, video playback, image slideshows
User-selectable character backlighting color lets you personalize the keyboard to better fit with the rest of your computer and gaming equipment
Twelve programmable G-keys with three macros per key provide space to program 36 single keypresses or complex macros
Two high-speed, powered USB 2.0 ports give you the ability to transfer data to and from peripherals like MP3 players and flash drives
Multi-key input allows you to use up to five keys at once to perform multiple complex actions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars477 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
